unnormalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!
normalised: ## Ace Your Exams with These Awesome Exam Prep Apps!

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Exam season is upon us, and if you're anything like me, you're probably feeling the pressure. But don't worry, tech to the rescue! Gone are the days of lugging around stacks of heavy textbooks. Thanks to EdTech, acing your exams is now possible with just your phone.
normalised: Hey everyone! Exam season is upon us, and if you are anything like me, you are probably feeling the pressure. But do not worry, tech to the rescue! Gone are the days of lugging around stacks of heavy textbooks. Thanks to E D Tech, acing your exams is now possible with just your phone.

unnormalised: I've been trying out a bunch of exam prep apps lately, and I wanted to share my top picks, especially for students preparing for exams in India. Think of it as your digital study buddy, always ready to help you out.
normalised: I have been trying out a bunch of exam prep apps lately, and I wanted to share my top picks, especially for students preparing for exams in India. Think of it as your digital study buddy, always ready to help you out.

unnormalised: First up is Gradeup (now BYJU'S Exam Prep). This is a really comprehensive app covering everything from IIT-JEE to banking exams. They have mock tests, live classes, and tons of study materials. It's a great all-in-one solution. My cousin, Priya, used it to crack her NEET exam last year and she swears by their mock tests.
normalised: First up is Gradeup (now B Y J U ' S Exam Prep). This is a really comprehensive app covering everything from I I T hyphen J E E to banking exams. They have mock tests, live classes, and tons of study materials. It is a great all-in-one solution. My cousin, Priya, used it to crack her N E E T exam last year and she swears by their mock tests.

unnormalised: Next, we have Testbook. This app is fantastic for government job exams. They have thousands of test series and quizzes, and they even have a feature where you can analyze your performance and identify your weak areas. Plus, they offer content in multiple languages, which is super helpful for students from different parts of India.
normalised: Next, we have Testbook. This app is fantastic for government job exams. They have thousands of test series and quizzes, and they even have a feature where you can analyze your performance and identify your weak areas. Plus, they offer content in multiple languages, which is super helpful for students from different parts of India.

unnormalised: For those preparing for competitive coding exams, HackerRank is a must-have. While not strictly an "exam prep" app, it allows you to practice coding problems, compete in challenges, and improve your skills. Think of it as practicing your cricket shots before the big match!
normalised: For those preparing for competitive coding exams, HackerRank is a must-have. While not strictly an "exam prep" app, it allows you to practice coding problems, compete in challenges, and improve your skills. Think of it as practicing your cricket shots before the big match!

unnormalised: Finally, don't forget about Khan Academy. This platform is amazing for learning fundamental concepts in math, science, and humanities. It's completely free and offers high-quality video lessons. They're expanding their content constantly.
normalised: Finally, do not forget about Khan Academy. This platform is amazing for learning fundamental concepts in math, science, and humanities. It is completely free and offers high-quality video lessons. They are expanding their content constantly.

unnormalised: Remember to take breaks! Overloading yourself won't help. Reward yourself after a good study session with some delicious biryani or maybe some Onam delicacies if it's that time of year.
normalised: Remember to take breaks! Overloading yourself will not help. Reward yourself after a good study session with some delicious biryani or maybe some Onam delicacies if it is that time of year.

unnormalised: So, download these apps, create a study schedule, and get ready to rock your exams! Remember, consistency is key. Good luck, everyone! Rs. 50 spent on a premium feature on one of these apps is probably a better investment than that pizza you were eyeing! And who knows, maybe you'll even get into IIT Delhi or IIM Ahmedabad! Just remember to focus on your studies and aim high. All the best! You can even cover 5 km extra everyday in the morning for a mental boost!
normalised: So, download these apps, create a study schedule, and get ready to rock your exams! Remember, consistency is key. Good luck, everyone! Rupee fifty spent on a premium feature on one of these apps is probably a better investment than that pizza you were eyeing! And who knows, maybe you will even get into I I T Delhi or I I M Ahmedabad! Just remember to focus on your studies and aim high. All the best! You can even cover five kilometer extra everyday in the morning for a mental boost!
